    52                                               input wire [4:0]  i_i_regf_DEV_INDEX ,
    53                                               input wire        i_i_regf_TOC       , 
    54                                               input wire        i_i_regf_WROC      , 
    55                                               
    56                                               // in case of immidiate command descriptor 
    57                                               input wire [2:0]  i_i_regf_DTT       , 
    58                                               
    59                                               // in case of regular command descriptor 
    60                                               input wire        i_i_regf_DBP       , 
    61                                               input wire        i_i_regf_SRE       , 
    62                                               
    63                                               output reg        o_frmcnt_Direct_Broadcast_n ,
    64                                               output reg        o_sclstall_en      ,
    65                                               output reg [4:0]  o_sclstall_code    ,
    66                                               output reg        o_tx_en            ,
    67                                               output reg [3:0]  o_tx_mode          ,
    68                                               output reg        o_rx_en    ,
    69                                               output reg [2:0]  o_rx_mode  ,
    70                                               output reg        o_bitcnt_en        ,
    71                                               output reg        o_bitcnt_err_rst   , 
    72                                               output reg        o_frmcnt_en        ,
    73                                               output reg        o_sdahand_pp_od    ,
    74                                               output reg        o_regf_wr_en       ,
    75                                               output reg        o_regf_rd_en       ,
    76                                               output reg [11:0] o_regf_addr        , // depends on the depth of the regfile
    77                                               output reg        o_engine_done      ,
    78                                               output reg [7:0]  o_txrx_addr_ccc    ,         
    79                                               output reg        o_engine_odd       ,         
    80                                               output reg [3:0]  o_regf_ERR_STATUS  , 
    81                                               
    82                                               output reg        o_en_mux           , //  for CCC handler environment only for crc muxes btn tx and rx   ( 1 for tx and 0 for rx 
    83                                               output reg        o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc 
    84                                               
    85                                               
    86                                               );   
    87                                               
    88                                               // internal signals 
    89                                               reg [4:0] current_state , next_state ;
    90              1                          1     reg       Direct_Broadcast_n     = 1'b0 ;                      // 1 for direct and 0 for broadcast
    91              1                          1     reg       Direct_Broadcast_n_del = 1'b0 ;           // delayed version of the above signal
    92                                               wire [6:0] target_addres ;
    93                                               reg       Defining_byte ; 
    94                                               reg       first_time ;
    95                                               reg       controller_abort ; // new by badr (needs to be assigned by some logic)
    96                                               integer   regular_counter ;
    97                                               integer   immediate_counter ; 
    98                                               reg [9:0] tmp_shift ;
    99                                               
    100                                              // configuration 
    101                                              reg        i_regf_RnW       ;  
    102                                              reg [2:0]  i_regf_CMD_ATTR  ;
    103                                              reg [7:0]  i_regf_CMD       ;
    104                                              reg [4:0]  i_regf_DEV_INDEX ;
    105                                              reg        i_regf_TOC       ;
    106                                              reg        i_regf_WROC      ;
    107                                              reg [2:0]  i_regf_DTT       ;
    108                                              reg        i_regf_DBP       ;
    109                                              reg        i_regf_SRE       ;
    110                                              
    111                                              
    112                                              ///////////////////////////////// state encoding //////////////////////////////////////////////
    113                                              
    114                                              // localparam to prevent overriding the states from outside the design
    115                                              // as states encoding should never be modified from outside (while instatiation)
    116                                              // after revision i will convert the coding style to grey
    117                                              localparam  [4:0]  IDLE               = 5'd0  , // 0
    118                                                                 PRE_CMD            = 5'd1  , // 1
    119                                                                 RNW                = 5'd2  , // 2
    120                                                                 RESERVED           = 5'd3  , // 3
    121                                                                 SECOND_CMD_BYTE    = 5'd4  , // 4
    122                                                                 PARITY_CMD         = 5'd5  , 
    123                                                                 PRE_FIRST_DATA_ONE = 5'd6  , 
    124                                                                 PRE_FIRST_DATA_TWO = 5'd7  , 
    125                                                                 CCC_BYTE           = 5'd8  , 
    126                                                                 DEFINING_BYTE      = 5'd9  , 
    127                                                                 ZEROS              = 5'd10 ,
    128                                                                 PARITY_DATA        = 5'd11 ,
    129                                                                 PRE_DATA_ONE       = 5'd12 ,
    130                                                                 PRE_DATA_TWO       = 5'd13 , 
    131                                                                 FIRST_DATA_BYTE    = 5'd14 , 
    132                                                                 SECOND_DATA_BYTE   = 5'd15 ,
    133                                                                 C_TOKEN_STATE      = 5'd16 , 
    134                                                                 CRC_CHECKSUM_STATE = 5'd17 , 
    135                                                                 RESTART_PATTERN    = 5'd18 , 
    136                                                                 EXIT_PATTERN       = 5'd19 , 
    137                                                                 ERROR              = 5'd20 , 
    138                                                                 FINISH             = 5'd21 , 
    139                                                                 PRE_CRC_TARGET     = 5'd22 ;
    140                                              
    141                                              parameter [6:0] SEVEN_E = 7'h7E ;
    142                                              
    143                                              // tx modes parameters 
    144                                              parameter [3:0]  
    145                                                              zero                   = 4'd6  ,  //                        
    146                                                              one                    = 4'd2  ,  //                        
    147                                                              special_preamble       = 4'd0  ,  // 01 of cmd word          
    148                                                              seven_zeros            = 4'd3  ,  // 7'b 0000_000            
    149                                                              serializing_address    = 4'd1  ,  // serializing 7 bits + 1 bit ParAdj      
    150                                                              serializing_byte_port  = 4'd5  ,  // serializing 8 bits that given from CCC to tx not from regfile to tx 
    151                                                              serializing_byte_regf  = 4'd7  ,  //                         
    152                                                              parity_calc            = 4'd4  ,  //                        
    153                                                              c_token_CRC            = 4'd12 ,  // 4'hC                    
    154                                                              value_CRC              = 4'd13 ,  // 5 bit value             
    155                                                              restart_pattern        = 4'd15 ,  //                         
    156                                                              exit_pattern           = 4'd14 ;  //                         
    157                                                              
    158                                              
    159                                              // regfile parameters 
    160                                              parameter [11:0] first_location = 12'd1000 ;
    161                                              
    162                                              // rx parameters 
    163                                              parameter [2:0] 
    164                                                               preamble_rx_mode    = 3'd0 , 
    165                                                               CRC_PREAMBLE        = 3'd1 ,
    166                                                               parity_check        = 3'd6 ,
    167                                                               deserializing_byte  = 3'd3 ,
    168                                                               check_c_token_CRC   = 3'd7 ,
    169                                                               check_value_CRC     = 3'd2 ,
    170                                                               ERROR_RX            = 3'b100  ;
    171                                              
    172                                              // SCL staller parameters 
    173                                              parameter [4:0] restart_pattern_stall = 5'd7, 
    174                                                              restart_pattern_stall_special = 5'd7, 
    175                                                              exit_pattern_stall    = 5'd13 ;  
    176                                              
    177                                              
    178                                              // Error states parameters 
    179                                              parameter [3:0] 
    180                                                              SUCCESS     = 4'h0  ,
    181                                                              CRC_ERR     = 4'h1  ,
    182                                                              PARITY_ERR  = 4'h2  ,
    183                                                              FRAME       = 4'h3  ,
    184                                                              ADDR_HEADER = 4'h4  ,
    185                                                              NACK        = 4'h5  ,
    186                                                              OVL         = 4'h6  ,
    187                                                              SRE         = 4'h7  ,
    188                                                              C_ABORTED   = 4'h8  ,
    189                                                              T_ABORTED   = 4'h9  ;
    190                                              // CCC values 
    191                                              parameter [7:0] 
    192                                                              ENEC_D      = 8'h80 ,   
    193                                                              DISEC_D     = 8'h81 , 
    194                                                              SETMWL_D    = 8'h89 ,
    195                                                              SETMRL_D    = 8'h8A ,
    196                                                              GETMWL_D    = 8'h8B ,
    197                                                              GETMRL_D    = 8'h8C ,
    198                                                              GETSTATUS_D = 8'h90 ,
    199                                                              GETPID_D    = 8'h8D ,
    200                                                              GETBCR_D    = 8'h8E ,
    201                                                              GETDCR_D    = 8'h8F ,
    202                                                              ENEC_B      = 8'h00 ,
    203                                                              DISEC_B     = 8'h01 ,
    204                                                              SETMWL_B    = 8'h09 ,
    205                                                              SETMRL_B    = 8'h0A ,
    206                                                              Dummy_B     = 8'h1F ;
    207                                              
    208                                              
    209             1                       5371     always @(*) begin 
    210             1                       5371         o_frmcnt_Direct_Broadcast_n = Direct_Broadcast_n ;
    211                                              end 
    212                                              
    213                                              /////////////////////////// decoding the device address  ///////////////////////////////////////
    214                                              
    215             1                       9707     assign target_addres = i_regf_DEV_INDEX + 'd8 ;
    216                                              
    217                                              
    218                                              //////////////////////////////////////// Direct or Broadcat detection  ///////////////////////////////////////////////
    219                                              
    220                                              // we have 16 required CCC to support at ground level 
    221                                              
    222                                              // to determine whether it's a Direct or Broadcast 
    223             1                      13915         always @(*) begin 
    224                                                      case (i_regf_CMD) 
    225             1                        887                 8'h80 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // ENEC     
    226             1                        913                 8'h81 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // DISEC       
    227             1                        641                 8'h89 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // SETMWL        
    228             1                        914                 8'h8A : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // SETMRL        
    229             1                        940                 8'h8B : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // GETMWL          
    230             1                        875                 8'h8C : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // GETMRL        
    231             1                        616                 8'h90 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // GETSTATUS  
    232             1                        934                 8'h8D : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // GETPID       
    233             1                        907                 8'h8E : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // GETBCR        
    234             1                        912                 8'h8F : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // GETDCR      
    235                                              
    236             1                        874                 8'h00 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b0 ;   // ENEC      (broadcast version)
    237             1                        962                 8'h01 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b0 ;   // DISEC     (broadcast version)
    238             1                        636                 8'h09 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b0 ;   // SETMWL    (broadcast version)
    239             1                        626                 8'h0A : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b0 ;   // SETMRL    (broadcast version)
    240                                                         
    241                                              
    242             1                        624                 8'h1F : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b0 ;    // Dummy CCC value for end procedure
    243             1                       1654                 default : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b0 ;  // broadcast by default
    244                                                      endcase
    245                                                  end
    246                                              
    247             1                     365084      always @ (posedge i_sys_clk or negedge i_sys_rst) begin 
    248                                                  if (!i_sys_rst) begin
    249             1                          2             tmp_shift <= 10'd0 ;
    250             1                          2             Direct_Broadcast_n_del <= 1'b0 ;
    251                                                  end 
    252                                                  else if (next_state == IDLE) begin 
    253             1                      25370             Direct_Broadcast_n_del <= 1'b0 ;
    254             1                      25370             tmp_shift <= 10'd0 ;
    255                                                  end 
    256                                                  else begin 
    257                                                      if (i_engine_en) begin 
    258             1                     329713                 tmp_shift[0] <= Direct_Broadcast_n ;
    259             1                     329713                 tmp_shift[9:1] <= tmp_shift [8:0] ;
    260             1                     329713                 Direct_Broadcast_n_del <= tmp_shift[9] ; // delayed 8 system clk cycles 
    261                                                      end 
    262                                                      else begin 
    263             1                       9999                 Direct_Broadcast_n_del <= 1'b0 ;
    264             1                       9999                 tmp_shift <= 10'd0 ;
    265                                                      end  
    266                                                  end   
    267                                              end 
    268                                              
    269                                              // Defining Byte identification 
    270             1                      10847         always @(*) begin 
    271                                                      if      (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0] && i_regf_DBP)                                                         
    272             1                    ***0***                 Defining_byte = 1'b1;  // regular 
    273                                                      else if ( i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0] && ( i_regf_DTT == 3'd5 ||  i_regf_DTT == 3'd6 || i_regf_DTT == 3'd7))  
    274             1                    ***0***                 Defining_byte = 1'b1 ; // immediate      
    275                                                      else                                                                                                
    276             1                      10847                 Defining_byte = 1'b0 ;
    277                                                  end 
    278                                              
    279                                              
    280                                              // Pulse stretcher 
    281                                              reg [1:0] pulse_counter ;  
    282                                              reg       i_sclstall_stall_done_strtch ;
    283                                              
    284             1                     116474     always @(posedge i_sys_clk or negedge i_sys_rst) begin
    285                                                  if (!i_sys_rst) begin
    286             1                          2             pulse_counter                 <= 2'b00 ;
    287             1                          2             i_sclstall_stall_done_strtch  <= 1'b0 ;
    288                                                  end 
    289                                                  else begin
    290                                                      if (i_sclstall_stall_done) begin
    291             1                      33278                 pulse_counter                <= 2'b11 ;
    292             1                      33278                 i_sclstall_stall_done_strtch <= 1'b1 ;
    293                                                      end 
    294                                                      else if (pulse_counter > 0) begin
    295             1                      49916                 pulse_counter                 <= pulse_counter - 1 ;
    296             1                      49916                 i_sclstall_stall_done_strtch <= 1'b1 ;
    297                                                      end 
    298                                                      else begin
    299             1                      33278                 i_sclstall_stall_done_strtch <= 1'b0 ;
    300                                                      end
    301                                                  end
    302                                              end
    303                                              
    304                                              
    305                                              ////////////////////////////////////////// state memory ////////////////////////////////////////////////
    306                                              
    307             1                     569924         always @(posedge i_sys_clk or negedge i_sys_rst) begin
    308                                                      if (!i_sys_rst) begin
    309             1                          2                 current_state <= IDLE ;
    310                                                      end
    311                                                      else  begin
    312             1                     569922                 current_state <= next_state ;
    313                                                      end
    314                                                  end
    315                                              
    316                                              ///////////////////////////////// next state and output logic //////////////////////////////////////////////
    317             1                    1305226         always@(*)begin
    318                                              
    319                                                  // initial values of outputs INTENTINAL LATCH that can be easily removed if STA analysis is fired 
    320                                              
    321             1                    1305226         o_sclstall_en              = 1'b0 ;  
    322             1                    1305226         o_sclstall_code            = 8'b0 ; 
    323             1                    1305226         o_tx_en                    = 1'b0 ; 
    324             1                    1305226         o_tx_mode                  = 4'b0 ; 
    325             1                    1305226         o_rx_en                    = 1'b0 ; 
    326             1                    1305226         o_rx_mode                  = 3'b0 ; 
    327             1                    1305226         o_bitcnt_en                = 1'b1 ; 
    328             1                    1305226         o_bitcnt_err_rst           = 1'b0 ; 
    329             1                    1305226         o_sdahand_pp_od            = 1'b1 ; // 1 means PP
    330             1                    1305226         o_regf_wr_en               = 1'b0 ;
    331             1                    1305226         o_regf_rd_en               = 1'b0 ;
    332             1                    1305226         o_engine_done              = 1'b0 ;
    333             1                    1305226         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    334                                              
    335                                              
    336                                                      case (current_state)
    337                                              
    338                                                          IDLE : begin                     // aw arbitration if needed  
    339                                                              // sampling the configuration once a sequence
    340                                                              
    341             1                      86318                     i_regf_RnW       = i_i_regf_RnW       ;
    342             1                      86318                     i_regf_CMD_ATTR  = i_i_regf_CMD_ATTR  ;
    343             1                      86318                     i_regf_CMD       = i_i_regf_CMD       ;
    344             1                      86318                     i_regf_DEV_INDEX = i_i_regf_DEV_INDEX ;
    345             1                      86318                     i_regf_TOC       = i_i_regf_TOC       ;
    346             1                      86318                     i_regf_WROC      = i_i_regf_WROC      ;
    347             1                      86318                     i_regf_DTT       = i_i_regf_DTT       ;
    348             1                      86318                     i_regf_DBP       = i_i_regf_DBP       ;
    349             1                      86318                     i_regf_SRE       = i_i_regf_SRE       ;
    350                                              
    351             1                      86318                     first_time        = 1'b1 ;   // flag to help to differentiate between the direct and broadcast with assistance of Direct_Braodcast_n flag 
    352             1                      86318                     o_bitcnt_en       = 1'b0 ;
    353             1                      86318                     regular_counter   = 'd8  ;   // data starts from ninth location
    354             1                      86318                     immediate_counter = 'd4  ;   // data starts from forth location
    355             1                      86318                     o_engine_odd      = 1'b0 ;
    356             1                      86318                     controller_abort  = 1'b0 ;
    357             1                      86318                     o_tx_en           = 1'b0 ;
    358             1                      86318                     o_frmcnt_en       = 1'b0 ;
    359             1                      86318                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    360                                              
    361                                                              if (i_engine_en) begin 
    362             1                      20000                         next_state = PRE_CMD ;
    363             1                      20000                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    364             1                      20000                         o_tx_en    = 1'b1 ; 
    365             1                      20000                         o_tx_mode  = special_preamble ; 
    366                                                              end
    367                                                              else begin 
    368             1                      66318                         next_state = IDLE ;
    369                                                              end 
    370                                              
    371                                                          end 
    372                                              
    373                                                          PRE_CMD : begin // i'm driving the 2 bits with 2'b01
    374                                                              if (i_engine_en) begin 
    375             1                      83330                         o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ; 
    376             1                      83330                         o_tx_mode = special_preamble ; 
    377             1                      83330                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    378                                              
    379                                                                  ///////////////// first cmd word direct or broadcast that's the point of the delay >> always sees the first cmd as broadcast////////////////////////
    380                                                                  if (i_tx_mode_done && !i_frmcnt_last_frame && !Direct_Broadcast_n_del && first_time) begin   
    381             1                      10000                             next_state = RNW ;
    382                                                                  end
    383                                                                  //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    384                                              
    385                                                                  ///////////////////////// first crc direct  ///////////////////////////
    386                                                                  else if (i_tx_mode_done && !i_frmcnt_last_frame && Direct_Broadcast_n_del && first_time) begin   
    387             1                       6639                             next_state = C_TOKEN_STATE ;
    388                                                                  end 
    389                                                                  //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    390                                              
    391                                                                  ////////////////////// Second cmd word direct //////////////
    392                                                                  else if (i_tx_mode_done && !i_frmcnt_last_frame && Direct_Broadcast_n_del && !first_time) begin   
    393             1                       6639                             next_state = RNW ;
    394                                                                  end
    395                                                                  //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    396                                              
    397                                                                  ///////////////////////// last crc direct ///////////////////////////
    398                                                                  else if (i_tx_mode_done && i_frmcnt_last_frame && Direct_Broadcast_n_del && !first_time ) begin   
    399             1                       2701                             next_state = C_TOKEN_STATE ;
    400                                                                  end 
    401                                                                  //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    402                                              
    403                                                                  ///////////////////////// last crc broadcast ///////////////////////////
    404                                                                  else if (i_tx_mode_done && i_frmcnt_last_frame && !Direct_Broadcast_n_del && !first_time ) begin   
    405             1                    ***0***                             next_state = C_TOKEN_STATE ;
    406                                                                  end 
    407                                                                  //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    408                                              
    409                                                                  ///////////////////////// last crc broadcast special for dummy case ///////////////////////////
    410                                                                  else if (i_tx_mode_done && i_frmcnt_last_frame && !Direct_Broadcast_n_del && first_time ) begin   
    411             1                       3361                             next_state = C_TOKEN_STATE ;
    412                                                                  end 
    413                                                                  //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    414                                              
    415                                                                  else begin 
    416             1                      53990                             next_state = PRE_CMD ;
    417                                                                  end
    418                                                              end 
    419                                                              else begin
    420             1                       9999                         next_state = IDLE ;
    421                                                              end
    422                                                          end 
    423                                              
    424                                                          PRE_CRC_TARGET : begin // target is driving the 2 bits with 2'b01
    425                                                              if (i_engine_en) begin
    426             1                       9423                         o_rx_en   = 1'b1 ; 
    427             1                       9423                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b1 ;
    428             1                       9423                         o_rx_mode                 = CRC_PREAMBLE ;   //o_rx_mode = parity_check ;
    429                                              
    430                                                                  if ((i_rx_mode_done && !i_rx_error) && i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin 
    431             1                       3141                             next_state = C_TOKEN_STATE ;
    432                                                                  end
    433                                                                  else if (i_rx_mode_done && i_rx_error ) begin  // at reading operation with matched data length    HENA BARDO PUT THE CONDITION (i_rx_mode_done && rx_err)
    434             1                    ***0***                             next_state = ERROR ;
    435             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_ERR_STATUS = FRAME ;
    436                                                                  end
    437                                                                  else begin 
    438             1                       6282                             next_state = PRE_CRC_TARGET ;
    439                                                                  end
    440                                                              end 
    441                                                              else begin 
    442             1                    ***0***                         next_state = IDLE ;
    443                                                              end 
    444                                                          end 
    445                                              
    446                                                          RNW : begin
    447             1                      33278                     o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    448             1                      33278                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    449                                              
    450                                                              if (first_time) begin 
    451             1                      20000                         o_tx_mode = zero ;
    452                                                              end 
    453                                                              else begin 
    454             1                       7876                         if (i_regf_RnW) o_tx_mode = one  ; // read 
    455             1                       5402                         else            o_tx_mode = zero  ; // write 
    456                                                              end
    457                                                              // state transition
    458                                                              if (i_tx_mode_done) begin 
    459             1                      16639                         next_state = RESERVED ;
    460                                                              end
    461                                                              else begin 
    462             1                      16639                         next_state = RNW ;
    463                                                              end
    464                                                          end 
    465                                              
    466                                              
    467                                                          RESERVED : begin
    468             1                     136601                     o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    469                                                              //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    470                                                              //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;    
    471             1                     136601                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    472             1                     136601                     o_tx_mode = seven_zeros ;
    473                                                              
    474                                                              // state transition
    475                                                              if (i_tx_mode_done) begin 
    476             1                      16639                         next_state = SECOND_CMD_BYTE ;
    477                                                              end
    478                                              
    479                                                              else begin 
    480             1                     119962                         next_state = RESERVED ;
    481                                                              end
    482                                                          end 
    483                                              
    484                                                          SECOND_CMD_BYTE : begin  // contains either 7E or any target address 
    485             1                     150387                     o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ; 
    486             1                     150387                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    487                                                              if (first_time) begin 
    488                                              
    489             1                      90000                         o_tx_mode = serializing_address ;
    490             1                      90000                         o_txrx_addr_ccc = SEVEN_E ;
    491                                              
    492                                                                  if (i_tx_mode_done) begin 
    493             1                      10000                             next_state = PARITY_CMD ;
    494                                                                  end
    495                                                                  else begin 
    496             1                      80000                             next_state = SECOND_CMD_BYTE ;
    497                                                                  end       
    498                                                              end 
    499                                                              else if (Direct_Broadcast_n_del && !first_time) begin 
    500             1                      60387                         o_frmcnt_en     = 1'b1 ;                    // new 
    501             1                      60387                         o_tx_mode       = serializing_address ;
    502             1                      60387                         o_txrx_addr_ccc = target_addres ;
    503                                              
    504                                                                  if (i_tx_mode_done) begin 
    505             1                       6639                             next_state = PARITY_CMD ;
    506                                                                  end
    507                                                                  else begin 
    508             1                      53748                             next_state = SECOND_CMD_BYTE ;
    509                                                                  end
    510                                              
    511                                                              end 
    512                                                              else begin 
    513             1                    ***0***                         o_tx_mode       = serializing_address ;
    514             1                    ***0***                         o_txrx_addr_ccc = target_addres ;
    515                                                                  
    516                                                                  if (i_tx_mode_done) begin 
    517             1                    ***0***                             next_state = PARITY_CMD ;
    518                                                                  end
    519                                                                  else begin 
    520             1                    ***0***                             next_state = SECOND_CMD_BYTE ;
    521                                                                  end
    522                                                              end 
    523                                                          end
    524                                              
    525                                                          PARITY_CMD : begin 
    526             1                      49917                     o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ; 
    527             1                      49917                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    528             1                      49917                     o_tx_mode = parity_calc ;
    529                                              
    530                                                              if (i_tx_mode_done) begin 
    531             1                      16639                         next_state   = PRE_FIRST_DATA_ONE ;
    532                                                                  //o_frmcnt_en  = 1'b1 ;
    533                                                              end
    534                                                              else begin 
    535             1                      33278                         next_state = PARITY_CMD ;
    536                                                              end
    537                                              
    538                                                              // erorr state condition is remaining 
    539                                              
    540                                                          end
    541                                              
    542                                              
    543                                                          PRE_FIRST_DATA_ONE : begin // should be 10 to mean ACK ,    and 11 is NACK
    544                                                          
    545             1                      33278                     o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    546             1                      33278                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    547             1                      33278                     o_tx_mode = one ;
    548             1                      33278                     o_rx_en   = 1'b0 ;
    549                                              
    550                                                              if (i_tx_mode_done) begin
    551             1                      16639                         next_state = PRE_FIRST_DATA_TWO ;
    552                                                              end
    553                                                              else begin 
    554             1                      16639                         next_state = PRE_FIRST_DATA_ONE ;
    555                                                              end 
    556                                                          
    557                                                          end 
    558                                              
    559                                                          PRE_FIRST_DATA_TWO : begin 
    560                                                              
    561             1                      49919                     o_rx_en                    = 1'b1 ;
    562             1                      49919                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b1 ;
    563             1                      49919                     o_rx_mode = preamble_rx_mode ;
    564                                              
    565                                                              if (i_rx_mode_done && !i_rx_pre && first_time) begin
    566             1                      10000                         next_state = CCC_BYTE ;
    567             1                      10000                         o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    568             1                      10000                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    569             1                      10000                         o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_port ;
    570             1                      10000                         o_txrx_addr_ccc = i_regf_CMD ;
    571                                                              end
    572                                              
    573                                                              else if (i_rx_mode_done && !i_rx_pre && !first_time) begin 
    574                                                              
    575                                                                  if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0] && !i_regf_RnW) begin              // if regular command discriptor  (but long write) not required cuurently but it's okk
    576             1                    ***0***                             o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_regf ;
    577             1                    ***0***                             o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    578             1                    ***0***                             o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;                        
    579             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; // regular counter starts with value 8 to point to the ninth location 
    580             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_wr_en = 1'b1 ;                
    581                                                                  end
    582                                                                  else if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0] && i_regf_RnW) begin              // if Read & Regular command discriptor  
    583             1                       3938                             o_tx_en   = 1'b0 ;
    584             1                       3938                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; // regular counter starts with value 8 to point to the ninth location                 
    585                                                                  end
    586                                              
    587                                                                  else begin // if immediate
    588             1                       2701                             o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    589                                                                                                    
    590                                                                      if (Defining_byte) begin 
    591             1                    ***0***                                 o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter + 1  ; // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to sixth location
    592             1                    ***0***                                 o_tx_mode   = serializing_byte_regf ;          // as first byte in the third location will contain the Defining Byte
    593                                                                      end 
    594                                                                      else begin 
    595             1                       2701                                 o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter ;        // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to fourth location
    596             1                       2701                                 o_tx_mode   = serializing_byte_regf ; 
    597                                                                      end 
    598                                                                  end
    599                                              
    600             1                       6639                         next_state   = FIRST_DATA_BYTE ;
    601             1                       6639                         o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    602                                                              end 
    603                                              
    604                                                              else if (i_rx_mode_done && i_rx_pre) begin 
    605             1                    ***0***                         o_tx_en           = 1'b0 ;
    606             1                    ***0***                         next_state        = ERROR ;
    607             1                    ***0***                         o_regf_ERR_STATUS = NACK ;
    608                                                              end 
    609                                              
    610                                                              else begin 
    611             1                      33280                         next_state = PRE_FIRST_DATA_TWO ;
    612                                                              end 
    613                                              
    614                                              
    615                                              
    616                                              
    617                                                              // new 12/6/2024 
    618                                                              if (!i_regf_RnW) begin  // write operation 
    619             1                      26291                         o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    620                                                                  if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin              // if regular command discriptor 
    621             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; // regular counter starts with value 8 to point to the ninth location 
    622                                                                  end 
    623                                                                  else begin                                  // if immediate
    624                                                                      if (Defining_byte) begin 
    625             1                    ***0***                                 o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter + 1  ; // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to sixth location
    626                                                                      end 
    627                                                                      else begin 
    628             1                      26291                                 o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter ;        // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to fourth location
    629                                                                      end 
    630                                                                  end 
    631                                                              end 
    632                                                          end 
    633                                              
    634                                              
    635                                              
    636                                                          CCC_BYTE : begin    // contains CCC value
    637                                              
    638             1                      80000                     o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    639             1                      80000                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;                
    640             1                      80000                     o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_port ;
    641             1                      80000                     o_txrx_addr_ccc = i_regf_CMD ;
    642                                              
    643                                                              if (i_tx_mode_done && Defining_byte) begin   // if a defining byte exists
    644             1                    ***0***                         next_state = DEFINING_BYTE ;
    645             1                    ***0***                         o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    646             1                    ***0***                         o_regf_addr  = first_location + 4 ;
    647                                                              end
    648                                                              else if (i_tx_mode_done && !Defining_byte) begin
    649             1                      10000                         o_regf_addr  = first_location - 1  ;               // laila edit 
    650             1                      10000                         o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;  
    651             1                      10000                         next_state = ZEROS ;
    652                                                              end 
    653                                                              else begin 
    654             1                      70000                         next_state = CCC_BYTE ;
    655                                                              end
    656                                              
    657                                                          end
    658                                              
    659                                                          DEFINING_BYTE : begin    // contains definaing byte if exist
    660             1                    ***0***                     o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    661             1                    ***0***                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;                
    662             1                    ***0***                     o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_regf ; 
    663             1                    ***0***                     o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    664             1                    ***0***                     o_regf_addr  = first_location + 4 ;                 // fifth location (8 bits width)
    665             1                    ***0***                     o_frmcnt_en  = 1'b1 ;
    666                                              
    667                                                              if (i_tx_mode_done) begin   
    668             1                    ***0***                         next_state = PARITY_DATA ;
    669                                                              end
    670                                                              else begin 
    671             1                    ***0***                         next_state = DEFINING_BYTE ;
    672                                                              end  
    673                                                          end
    674                                              
    675                                                          ZEROS : begin                               // eight zeros fixed at regfile (e.g location 999)
    676             1                     124646                     o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    677             1                     124646                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    678             1                     124646                     o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_regf ; 
    679             1                     124646                     o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    680             1                     124646                     o_regf_addr  = first_location - 1  ;
    681                                              
    682                                                              // new (instead of just o_frmcnt_en  = 1'b1 ;)
    683                                                              if (Direct_Broadcast_n_del && first_time) begin 
    684             1                      59751                         o_frmcnt_en  = 1'b0 ;
    685                                                              end
    686                                                              else begin 
    687             1                      64895                         o_frmcnt_en  = 1'b1 ;
    688                                                              end  
    689                                                              //////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    690                                                              if (i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin 
    691             1                      35927                         o_engine_odd = 1'b1 ; 
    692                                                              end 
    693                                                              else begin 
    694             1                      88719                         o_engine_odd = 1'b0 ; 
    695                                                              end 
    696                                              
    697                                                              if (i_tx_mode_done) begin   
    698             1                      13758                         next_state = PARITY_DATA ;
    699                                              
    700                                                              end
    701                                                              else begin 
    702             1                     110888                         next_state = ZEROS ;
    703                                                              end
    704                                              
    705                                                              // erorr state condition is remaining   
    706                                                          end
    707                                              
    708                                                          PARITY_DATA : begin // parity state any Data word
    709                                                              if (!i_regf_RnW || first_time) begin // write 
    710             1                      50412                         o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    711             1                      50412                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    712                                              
    713                                              
    714             1                      50412                         o_tx_mode = parity_calc ;
    715                                                                  if  (i_tx_mode_done) begin // if broadcast
    716                                              
    717                                                                      if (i_frmcnt_last_frame || (Direct_Broadcast_n_del & first_time)) begin  // crc state only in case of Direct or in case of last data 
    718             1                      12701                                 next_state = PRE_CMD ; // BEGINING OF CRC 
    719                                                                      end 
    720                                                                      else begin 
    721             1                       4103                                 next_state = PRE_DATA_ONE ; // not last byte then continue sending/recieving repeated data 
    722                                                                      end 
    723                                                                  end
    724                                              
    725                                                                  else begin 
    726             1                      33608                             next_state = PARITY_DATA ;
    727                                                                  end
    728                                                              end 
    729                                                              else begin // read 
    730             1                      16671                         o_rx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    731             1                      16671                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b1 ;
    732             1                      16671                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b1 ;
    733             1                      16671                         o_rx_mode = parity_check ;
    734                                                                  if  (i_rx_mode_done && !i_rx_error) begin 
    735                                              
    736                                                                      if (i_frmcnt_last_frame || (Direct_Broadcast_n_del && first_time)) begin  // crc state only in case of Direct or in case of last data 
    737             1                       3141                                 next_state = PRE_CRC_TARGET ; // 
    738                                                                      end
    739                                                                      else if (i_frmcnt_last_frame || (Direct_Broadcast_n_del && !first_time)) begin // read case with more than 2 data bytes
    740             1                       1619                                 next_state = PRE_DATA_ONE ;
    741                                                                      end  
    742                                                                      else begin 
    743             1                    ***0***                                 next_state = PRE_DATA_ONE ; // not last byte then continue sending/recieving repeated data
    744                                                                      end 
    745                                                                  end
    746                                              
    747                                                                  else if (i_rx_mode_done && i_rx_error) begin 
    748             1                        797                             next_state = ERROR ;
    749             1                        797                             o_regf_ERR_STATUS = PARITY_ERR ;
    750                                                                  end 
    751                                              
    752                                                                  else begin 
    753             1                      11114                             next_state = PARITY_DATA ;
    754                                                                  end
    755                                                              end 
    756                                                          end
    757                                              
    758                                                          PRE_DATA_ONE : begin  //  11  means ok continue , and 10 to be aborted 
    759                                                              if (!i_regf_RnW) begin // write 
    760             1                       8206                         o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    761                                              
    762             1                       8206                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;                 
    763             1                       8206                         o_tx_mode = one ;
    764             1                       8206                         o_rx_en   = 1'b0 ;
    765                                                                  if (i_tx_mode_done) begin
    766             1                       4103                             next_state = PRE_DATA_TWO ;
    767                                                                  end
    768                                                                  else begin 
    769             1                       4103                             next_state = PRE_DATA_ONE ;
    770                                                                  end 
    771                                                              end 
    772                                              
    773                                                              else begin 
    774             1                       3238                         o_tx_en   = 1'b0 ;
    775             1                       3238                         o_rx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    776             1                       3238                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b1 ;
    777             1                       3238                         o_rx_mode = preamble_rx_mode ;
    778                                                                  
    779                                                                  if (i_rx_mode_done && i_rx_pre) begin
    780             1                       1619                             next_state = PRE_DATA_TWO ;
    781             1                       1619                             o_rx_mode  = preamble_rx_mode ;
    782                                                                  end
    783                                                                  else if (i_rx_mode_done && !i_rx_pre) begin
    784             1                    ***0***                             next_state = ERROR ;
    785             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_ERR_STATUS  = FRAME ;
    786                                                                  end
    787                                                                  else begin 
    788             1                       1619                             next_state = PRE_DATA_ONE ;
    789                                                                  end 
    790                                                              end 
    791                                                          end 
    792                                              
    793                                                          PRE_DATA_TWO : begin 
    794                                                              if (!i_regf_RnW) begin // write
    795             1                      12309                         o_tx_en   = 1'b0 ;
    796             1                      12309                         o_rx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    797             1                      12309                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b1 ;
    798                                                                  //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b1 ;
    799             1                      12309                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b1 ;
    800             1                      12309                         o_rx_mode = preamble_rx_mode ;
    801                                              
    802                                                                  if (i_rx_mode_done && i_rx_pre) begin  // ack by target
    803             1                       4103                             next_state = FIRST_DATA_BYTE ;
    804                                                                  ////////////////////////////////// new ////////////////////////////////
    805             1                       4103                             o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    806                                                                      //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    807                                                                      //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    808             1                       4103                             o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    809             1                       4103                             o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    810                                                                      if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin              // if regular command discriptor  
    811             1                    ***0***                                 o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_regf ;
    812             1                    ***0***                                 o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; // regular counter starts with value 8 to point to the ninth location 
    813                                                                      end 
    814                                                                      else begin                                  // if immediate
    815                                                                          if (Defining_byte) begin 
    816             1                    ***0***                                     o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter + 1  ; // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to sixth location
    817                                                  
    818             1                    ***0***                                     o_tx_mode   = serializing_byte_regf ;          // as first byte in the third location will contain the Defining Byte
    819                                                                          end 
    820                                                                          else begin 
    821             1                       4103                                     o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter ;        // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to fourth location
    822             1                       4103                                     o_tx_mode   = serializing_byte_regf ; 
    823                                                                          end 
    824                                                                      end 
    825                                                                  //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    826                                                                  end
    827                                              
    828                                                                  else if (i_rx_mode_done && !i_rx_pre) begin // abort by target
    829             1                    ***0***                             next_state        = ERROR ;
    830             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_ERR_STATUS = T_ABORTED ;
    831                                                                  end 
    832                                              
    833                                                                  else begin 
    834             1                       8206                             next_state = PRE_DATA_TWO ;
    835                                                                  end 
    836                                                              end 
    837                                                              else begin 
    838                                                                  // tx signals 
    839             1                       3238                         o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    840                                                                  //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    841                                                                  //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    842             1                       3238                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    843                                                                  if (controller_abort) begin 
    844             1                    ***0***                             o_tx_mode = zero ;
    845                                                                  end 
    846                                                                  else begin 
    847             1                       3238                             o_tx_mode = one ;                   // open drain
    848                                                                      //o_sdahand_pp_od = open drain ; 
    849                                                                  end
    850                                              
    851                                                                  if (i_tx_mode_done) begin  
    852             1                       1619                             next_state = FIRST_DATA_BYTE ;
    853                                                                  end
    854                                              
    855                                                                 
    856                                              
    857                                                                  else begin 
    858             1                       1619                             next_state = PRE_DATA_TWO ;
    859                                                                  end
    860                                                              end 
    861                                              
    862                                              
    863                                                              // new 12/6/2024 
    864                                                              if (!i_regf_RnW) begin  // write operation 
    865             1                      12309                         o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    866                                                                  if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin              // if regular command discriptor 
    867             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; // regular counter starts with value 8 to point to the ninth location 
    868                                                                  end 
    869                                                                  else begin                                  // if immediate
    870                                                                      if (Defining_byte) begin 
    871             1                    ***0***                                 o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter + 1  ; // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to sixth location
    872                                                                      end 
    873                                                                      else begin 
    874             1                      12309                                 o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter ;        // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to fourth location
    875                                                                      end 
    876                                                                  end 
    877                                                              end 
    878
