    879                                                          end                     
    880                                              
    881                                              
    882                                              
    883                                                          FIRST_DATA_BYTE : begin    // contains first repeated data byte
    884                                                              if (!i_regf_RnW) begin  // write operation 
    885             1                      57554                         o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    886             1                      57554                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    887             1                      57554                         o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    888                                                                  if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin              // if regular command discriptor  
    889             1                    ***0***                             o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_regf ;
    890             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; // regular counter starts with value 8 to point to the ninth location 
    891                                                                  end 
    892                                                                  else begin                                  // if immediate
    893                                                                      if (Defining_byte) begin 
    894             1                    ***0***                                 o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter + 1  ; // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to sixth location
    895                                                  
    896             1                    ***0***                                 o_tx_mode   = serializing_byte_regf ;          // as first byte in the third location will contain the Defining Byte
    897                                                                      end 
    898                                                                      else begin 
    899             1                      57554                                 o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter ;        // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to fourth location
    900             1                      57554                                 o_tx_mode   = serializing_byte_regf ; 
    901                                                                      end 
    902                                                                  end 
    903                                                              end 
    904                                              
    905                                                              // read operation 
    906                                                              else begin 
    907                                                                  if (i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin 
    908             1                      10407                             o_engine_odd = 1'b1 ; 
    909                                                                  end 
    910                                                                  else begin 
    911             1                      46760                             o_engine_odd = 1'b0 ; 
    912                                                                  end 
    913             1                      57167                         o_rx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    914             1                      57167                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b1 ;
    915             1                      57167                         o_regf_wr_en = 1'b1 ;
    916                                                                  if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin              // if regular command discriptor  
    917             1                      57167                             o_rx_mode    = deserializing_byte ;
    918             1                      57167                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; // regular counter starts with value 4 to point to the fifth location 
    919                                                                  end 
    920                                                                  else begin  // there is no immediate case in the read operation 
    921             1                    ***0***                             next_state = ERROR ;
    922             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_ERR_STATUS = FRAME ;
    923                                                                  end 
    924                                                              end
    925                                              
    926                                                              // for both read and write 
    927                                                              if (i_tx_mode_done && i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin  // to handle odd number of bytes in both regular and immediate
    928             1                       3758                         next_state   = ZEROS ;
    929             1                       3758                         o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    930             1                       3758                         o_regf_addr  = first_location - 1 ; 
    931                                                                  //o_engine_odd = 1'b1 ;            // to be put in the response discreptor      
    932                                                              end
    933                                              
    934                                                              //// new 3/5/2024
    935                                                              else if (i_rx_mode_done && i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin 
    936             1                       1597                         next_state = SECOND_DATA_BYTE ; 
    937                                                                  //immediate_counter = immediate_counter + 1 ;  there can't be immediate Transfer Command Discriptor with direct get 
    938             1                       1597                         regular_counter   = regular_counter + 1 ;
    939                                                                  end
    940                                              
    941                                                               
    942                                                              /////////////////////
    943                                              
    944                                                              else if ((i_rx_mode_done | i_tx_mode_done) && !i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin  
    945             1                       7006                         next_state = SECOND_DATA_BYTE ; 
    946             1                       7006                         immediate_counter = immediate_counter + 1 ;
    947             1                       7006                         regular_counter   = regular_counter + 1 ;
    948                                              
    949                                              
    950                                              // 12/6/2024
    951                                                                  if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin              
    952             1                       3960                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; 
    953                                                                  end 
    954                                                                  else begin
    955             1                       3046                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + immediate_counter ;
    956                                                                  end 
    957                                                                  /////////////////
    958                                                              end
    959                                              
    960                                              
    961                                                              
    962                                                              else begin 
    963             1                     102360                         next_state = FIRST_DATA_BYTE ;                  
    964                                                              end
    965                                              
    966                                                          end
    967                                              
    968                                              
    969                                                          SECOND_DATA_BYTE : begin   // contains second repeated data byte
    970                                                              if (!i_regf_RnW) begin // write operation 
    971             1                      28894                         o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    972             1                      28894                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    973             1                      28894                         o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    974             1                      28894                         o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_regf ;
    975                                                                  if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin              // if regular command discriptor  
    976             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; 
    977                                                                  end
    978                                                                  else begin 
    979             1                      28894                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + immediate_counter ; 
    980                                                                  end 
    981                                                                  if (i_tx_mode_done) begin 
    982             1                       3046                             next_state = PARITY_DATA ; 
    983                                                                      if (i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin 
    984                                                                          // no need to put conditions , immediated and regular can't happen together
    985             1                       1480                                 immediate_counter = immediate_counter ;
    986             1                       1480                                 regular_counter   = regular_counter   ;
    987                                                                      end 
    988                                                                      else begin 
    989                                                                          // no need to put conditions , immediated and regular can't happen together
    990             1                       1566                                 immediate_counter = immediate_counter + 1 ;
    991             1                       1566                                 regular_counter   = regular_counter   + 1 ;
    992                                                                      end        
    993                                                                  end
    994                                                                  else begin 
    995             1                      25848                             next_state = SECOND_DATA_BYTE ;                        
    996                                                                  end 
    997                                                              end 
    998                                                              else begin  // read operation 
    999                                                                  
    1000            1                      51557                         o_rx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    1001            1                      51557                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b1 ;
    1002            1                      51557                         o_regf_wr_en = 1'b1 ;
    1003            1                      51557                         o_rx_mode    = deserializing_byte ;
    1004                                                                 if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin                          // if regular command discriptor  
    1005            1                      51557                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; 
    1006                                                                 end
    1007                                                                 else begin  // there is no immediate case in the read operation 
    1008            1                    ***0***                             next_state = ERROR ;
    1009            1                    ***0***                             o_regf_ERR_STATUS = FRAME ;
    1010                                                                 end 
    1011                                                                 if (i_rx_mode_done) begin   
    1012            1                       5557                             next_state = PARITY_DATA ;
    1013                                                                     // no need to put conditions , immediated and regular can't happen together
    1014                                                                     //immediate_counter = immediate_counter + 1 ;
    1015            1                       5557                             regular_counter   = regular_counter   + 1 ;
    1016                                                                 end 
    1017                                                                 else begin 
    1018            1                      46000                             next_state = SECOND_DATA_BYTE ;
    1019                                             
    1020                                                                 end
    1021                                                             end     
    1022                                                         end
    1023                                                     
    1024                                                         C_TOKEN_STATE : begin 
    1025            1                      47526                     o_bitcnt_en        = 1'b0 ;
    1026                                                             if (!i_regf_RnW || first_time) begin // write 
    1027            1                      38103                         o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;

    1030                                             
    1031                                                                 if (i_tx_mode_done) begin

  File scl_generation.v
    34                                               module scl_generation(
    35                                                   input  wire       i_sdr_ctrl_clk          ,   // 50 MHz clock
    36                                                   input  wire       i_sdr_ctrl_rst_n        ,
    37                                                   input  wire       i_sdr_scl_gen_pp_od     ,   // 1: Push-Pull      // 0: for Open-Drain
    38                                                   input  wire       i_scl_gen_stall         ,  // 1 for stalling
    39                                                   input  wire       i_sdr_ctrl_scl_idle     ,
    40                                                   input  wire       i_timer_cas             ,
    41                                                   output reg        o_scl_pos_edge          ,
    42                                                   output reg        o_scl_neg_edge          ,
    43                                                   output reg        o_scl                  );
    44                                               
    45                                               
    46                                               //-- states encoding in gray ---------------------------------------------
    47                                               
    48                                               localparam LOW  = 1'b0 ;
    49                                               localparam HIGH = 1'b1 ;
    50                                               
    51                                               
    52                                               //-- internal wires declaration -------------------------------------------
    53                                               
    54                                               reg          state   ;  //assigned at fsm
    55                                               reg  [6:0]   count   ;  //assigned at counter
    56                                               reg          switch  ;  //assigned at counter
    57                                               
    58                                               
    59                                               //-- scl generation fsm ---------------------------------------------------
    60                                               
    61              1                    2281225     always @(posedge i_sdr_ctrl_clk or negedge i_sdr_ctrl_rst_n)
    62                                                 begin: scl_generation_fsm
    63                                               
    64                                                   if (!i_sdr_ctrl_rst_n)
    65                                                     begin
    66                                                       //-- state
    67              1                          2               state   <=  HIGH   ;
    68                                                       //-- outputs
    69              1                          2               o_scl   <=  1'b1  ;
    70              1                          2               o_scl_pos_edge <= 1'b0;
    71              1                          2               o_scl_neg_edge <= 1'b0;
    72                                                     end
    73                                               
    74                                                   else
    75                                                     begin
    76                                                       case (state)
    77                                                         LOW: begin
    78              1                    1140610                     o_scl_neg_edge <= 1'b0;
    79                                                               if (i_scl_gen_stall) begin
    80              1                    ***0***                      state <=   LOW  ;
    81                                                               end
    82                                                               else begin
    83                                                                   if (switch)
    84                                                                     begin
    85              1                     570305                             o_scl <=   1'b1 ;
    86              1                     570305                             state <=   HIGH ;
    87              1                     570305                             o_scl_pos_edge <= 1'b1;
    88                                                                     end
    89                                                                   else
    90                                                                     begin
    91              1                     570305                             o_scl <=   1'b0 ;
    92              1                     570305                             state <=   LOW  ;
    93              1                     570305                             o_scl_pos_edge <= 1'b0;
    94                                                                     end
    95                                                               end
    96                                                           end
    97                                               
    98                                                         HIGH:
    99                                                           begin
    100             1                    1140612                 o_scl_pos_edge <= 1'b0;
    101                                                              if (i_scl_gen_stall) begin // badr 
    102             1                    ***0***                       o_scl <=   1'b0 ;
    103             1                    ***0***                       state <=   LOW  ;
    104             1                    ***0***                       o_scl_neg_edge <= 1'b1;
    105                                                              end
    106                                                              else if ((switch && !i_sdr_ctrl_scl_idle) || (i_timer_cas) )
    107                                                                begin
    108             1                     570306                         o_scl <=   1'b0 ;
    109             1                     570306                         state <=   LOW  ;
    110             1                     570306                         o_scl_neg_edge <= 1'b1;
    111                                                                end
    112                                                              else
    113                                                                begin
    114             1                     570306                         o_scl <=   1'b1 ;
    115             1                     570306                         state <=   HIGH ;
    116             1                     570306                         o_scl_neg_edge <= 1'b0;
    117                                                                end
    118                                                          end
    119                                                      endcase
    120                                                    end
    121                                                end
    122                                              //-- switch generation counter --------------------------------------------
    123                                              
    124             1                    2281226     always @(posedge i_sdr_ctrl_clk or negedge i_sdr_ctrl_rst_n)
    125                                                begin: scl_generation_counter
    126                                              
    127                                                  if (!i_sdr_ctrl_rst_n)
    128                                                    begin
    129             1                          2               count  <= 7'b1 ;
    130             1                          2               switch <= 1'b0 ;
    131                                                    end
    132                                              
    133                                                // 50 MHz/4 = 12.5 MHz for Push-Pull
    134                                                  else if (i_sdr_scl_gen_pp_od)
    135                                                    begin
    136                                                        if (count >= 7'd2)
    137                                                          begin
    138             1                    1140611                   count  <= 7'b1 ;
    139             1                    1140611                   switch <= 1'b1 ;
    140                                                          end
    141                                                        else
    142                                                          begin
    143             1                    1140613                   count  <= count + 1'b1 ;
    144             1                    1140613                   switch <= 1'b0 ;
    145                                                          end
    146                                                    end
    147

    149                                                  else

    152                                                          begin
    153             1                    ***0***                   switch <= 1'b1;
    154             1                    ***0***                   count <= count + 1'b1;

    2                                                module frame_counter(
    3                                                    input  wire        i_fcnt_clk         ,
    4                                                    input  wire        i_fcnt_rst_n       ,
    5                                                    input  wire        i_fcnt_en          ,
    6                                                    input  wire        i_regf_CMD_ATTR    ,     // HDR 1 bit only selects bit [0] (1 for immediate and 0 for regular)
    7                                                    input  wire [15:0] i_regf_DATA_LEN    ,     // HDR 
    8                                                    input  wire [2:0]  i_regf_DTT         ,     // HDR
    9                                                    input  wire [5:0]  i_cnt_bit_count    ,     // HDR
    10                                                   //input  wire        i_ccc_Direct_Broadcast_n ,     // HDR  1 for direct and 0 for Broadcast
    11                                                   input  wire        i_bitcnt_toggle    , 
    12                                                   output reg         o_cccnt_last_frame       // HDR
    13                                                   );
    14                                               	
    15              1                          1     reg [15:0] count = 16'd0 ;
    16                                               //wire       count_done   ;
    17                                               
    18              1                    1006938         always @(posedge i_fcnt_clk or negedge i_fcnt_rst_n) begin 
    19                                                       if (!i_fcnt_rst_n) begin 
    20              1                          2                 o_cccnt_last_frame = 1'b0 ;
    21              1                          2                 count              = 16'd0 ;
    22                                                       end 
    23                                                       else begin 
    24                                                           if(i_fcnt_en) begin 
    25                                                               if (count == 16'd0) begin 
    26              1                     142745                         o_cccnt_last_frame = 1'b1 ;
    27                                                                   // stay here for 20 bits
    28                                                               end 
    29                                                               else begin 
    30                                                                   if ((i_cnt_bit_count == 'd6 || i_cnt_bit_count == 'd16) && i_bitcnt_toggle) begin 
    31              1                      30325                             count = count - 1 ;
    32                                                                   end 
    33                                                               end 
    34                                                           end 
    35                                                           else begin                                  // Disabled to load the count value
    36              1                     549151                     o_cccnt_last_frame = 1'b0 ;
    37                                                               if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR) begin             // regular 
    38              1                     247310                         count = i_regf_DATA_LEN + 1 ;       // fixed whether Direct or Broadcast
    39                                                               end
    40                                                               else begin //immediate 
    41                                                                   case (i_regf_DTT) 
    42              1                      72535                             3'd0 : count = 1 ;
    43              1                      77168                             3'd1 : count = 2 ;

    123

    144

    147

    155                                               	begin: regf_file_always
    156                                               		if (!i_regf_rst_n)
    157                                               			begin
    158                                               				
    159                                               				  /////////////////////////////////////////////      HDR     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    160                                               				  // DWORD0 for Dummy configuration .. that's a fixed configurations that doesn't change so it's made on the reset condition
    161                                               				  // so whenever is needed to excute this dummy configuration the engine just has to give the input "i_engine_configuration" a value equals "DUMMY_CONFIGURATION" value .. say 'd 900

    26                                                                 serializing_address = 'b0001, 	//'d1			//address of target
    27                                                   			  serializing_zeros = 'b0011 ,  	//'d3			//7-zeros in the first byte of cmd word        
    28                                                                 one = 'b0010, 					//'d2			// for representing preamble bit or reading_or_writing bit  
    29                                                                 zero = 'b0110, 					//'d6			// for representing preamble bit or reading_or_writing bit
    30                                               				  serializing_data = 'b0111, 		//'d7			//data byte from reg to be serialized
    31                                               				  CCC_value = 'b0101 , 				//'d5			//special data in case of transmitting CCC
    32                                               				  calculating_Parity = 'b0100,  	//'d4			//parity of word serialized either cmd word or data word
    33                                               				  token_CRC = 'b1100, 				//'d12			//special bits 4'b1100
    34                                               				  CRC_value = 'b1101, 				//'d13			//CRC value arrived of data serialized

    294                                              			.i_mux_zero(i_rx_regfcrc_data_wr_tb),
    295                                              			.i_selector(my_regf_data_wr_tb_selector),
    296                                              			.o_mux_out(my_regf_data_wr_tb_mux_out)
    297                                              			);
    298                                              
    299                                              		mux  #(.WIDTH(12)) DUT8 (
    300                                              			.i_mux_one(my_regf_addr_tb),
    301                                              			.i_mux_zero(o_regf_addr_tb),
    302                                              			.i_selector(my_regf_addr_tb_selector),
    303                                              			.o_mux_out(my_regf_addr_tb_mux_out)
    304                                              			);
    305                                              
    306                                              
    307                                              
    308                                              		RX rx_dut (
    309                                              		.i_sys_clk					(i_sys_clk_tb)				,
    310                                              		.i_sys_rst					(i_rst_n_tb)				,
    311                                              		.i_sclgen_scl				(o_scl_tb)					,
    312                                              		.i_sclgen_scl_pos_edge		(scl_pos_edge_tb)			,
    313                                              		.i_sclgen_scl_neg_edge		(scl_neg_edge_tb)			,
    314                                              		.i_ddrccc_rx_en				(o_rx_en_tb)				,
    315                                              		.i_sdahnd_rx_sda			(i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb)		,
    316                                              		//.i_bitcnt_rx_bit_count 	(i_bitcnt_rx_bit_count_tb)	,
    317                                              		.i_ddrccc_rx_mode			(o_rx_mode_tb)				,
    318                                              		.i_crc_value				(i_crc_value_tb)			,
    319                                              		.i_crc_valid				(i_crc_valid_tb)			,
    320                                              			
    321                                              		.o_regfcrc_rx_data_out		(i_rx_regfcrc_data_wr_tb)			,
    322                                              		.o_ddrccc_rx_mode_done		(i_rx_mode_done_tb)			,
    323                                              		.o_ddrccc_pre				(i_rx_pre_tb)				,
    324                                              		.o_ddrccc_error				(i_rx_error_tb)				,
    325                                              		.o_crc_en					(crc_en_rx)                 , // 
    326                                              		.o_crc_data_valid           (o_crc_data_valid_rx_tb)    ,
    327                                              		.o_crc_last_byte 			(o_crc_last_byte_rx_tb)
    328                                              		//.o_ddrccc_error_done   	    (o_ddrccc_error_done_tb)      
    329                                              
    330                                              );
    331                                                  	
    332                                                  
    333                                              
    334                                                  	tx tx_dut (
    335                                              		.i_sys_clk 				 (i_sys_clk_tb),
    336                                              		.i_sys_rst 				 (i_rst_n_tb),
    337                                              
    338                                              		.i_ddrccc_tx_en 		 (o_tx_en_tb),
    339                                              		.i_sclgen_scl_pos_edge 	 (scl_pos_edge_tb),
    340                                              		.i_sclgen_scl_neg_edge 	 (scl_neg_edge_tb),
    341                                              		.i_ddrccc_tx_mode 		 (o_tx_mode_tb),
    342                                              
    343                                              		.i_regf_tx_parallel_data (i_regf_tx_parallel_data_tb),
    344                                              		.i_ddrccc_special_data 	 (o_txrx_addr_ccc_tb),
    345                                              		.i_crc_crc_value 		 (i_crc_value_tb),
    346                                              		.i_crc_data_valid  	  	 (i_crc_valid_tb), // new 
    347                                              		.i_regf_read_n_write_bit (i_regf_RnW_tb), // new
    348                                              		.o_sdahnd_serial_data 	 (o_sdahnd_serial_data_tb),
    349                                              		.o_ddrccc_mode_done 	 (i_tx_mode_done_tb),
    350                                              		.o_crc_parallel_data 	 (o_crc_parallel_data_tx_tb),
    351                                              		.o_crc_en 				 (crc_en_tx) ,
    352                                              		.o_crc_last_byte 		 (o_crc_last_byte_tx_tb), // new
    353                                              		.o_crc_data_valid 		 (o_crc_data_valid_tx_tb)	// new
    354                                              );
    355                                              
    356                                                  
    357                                              
    358                                              	crc crc_dut (
    359                                              	.i_sys_clk(i_sys_clk_tb),
    360                                                  .i_sys_rst(i_rst_n_tb),
    361                                                  .i_txrx_en(mux1_out1),
    362                                              	.i_txrx_data_valid(mux1_out3),
    363                                              	.i_txrx_last_byte(mux1_out2),
    364                                              	.i_txrx_data(mux8_out),
    365                                              	.o_txrx_crc_value(i_crc_value_tb),
    366                                              	.o_txrx_crc_valid (i_crc_valid_tb)
    367                                              
    368                                              );
    369                                              
    370                                              
    371                                              mux1      mux1_1 (
    372                                              	.en(o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc),
    373                                              	.tx(crc_en_tx),
    374                                              	.rx(crc_en_rx),
    375                                              	.y(mux1_out1)
    376                                              	
    377                                              );
    378                                              
    379                                              mux1      mux1_2 (
    380                                              	.en(o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc),
    381                                              	.tx(o_crc_last_byte_tx_tb),
    382                                              	.rx(o_crc_last_byte_rx_tb),
    383                                              	.y(mux1_out2)
    384                                              	
    385                                              );
    386                                              
    387                                              
    388                                              mux1      mux1_3 (
    389                                              	.en(o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc),
    390                                              	.tx(o_crc_data_valid_tx_tb),
    391                                              	.rx(o_crc_data_valid_rx_tb),
    392                                              	.y(mux1_out3)
    393                                              	
    394                                              );
    395                                              
    396                                              
    397                                              mux8      mux1_8 (
    398                                              	.en(o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc),
    399                                              	.tx(o_crc_parallel_data_tx_tb),
    400                                              	.rx(i_rx_regfcrc_data_wr_tb),
    401                                              	.y(mux8_out)
    402                                              	
    403                                              );
    404                                              
    405                                              
    406                                                  	// initialize the object with the default values in the class defined as bit >> 0
    407                                                  	configuration conf_obj ;
    408                                              
    409                                              
    410                                                  	// inputs to be randomized 
    411                                              
    412                                                  	//////////////////////// DWORD0  //////////////////////
    413                                                  	reg [2:0] RAND_CMD_ATTR      ;
    414                                                  	reg [3:0] RAND_TID           ;
    415                                               		reg [7:0] RAND_CMD           ;
    416                                               		reg 	  RAND_CP            ;
    417                                               		reg [4:0] RAND_DEV_INDEX     ;
    418                                               		reg [1:0] RAND_RESERVED      ;
    419                                               		reg [2:0] RAND_DTT           ; 	 	 // or {DBP,SRE,reserved}
    420                                               		reg [2:0] RAND_MODE          ;
    421                                               		reg  	  RAND_RnW           ;
    422                                               		reg   	  RAND_WROC          ;
    423                                               		reg 	  RAND_TOC           ;
    424                                              
    425                                                  	//////////////////////// DWORD1  //////////////////////
    426                                                  	reg [7:0] RAND_DEF_BYTE     ;
    427                                                  	reg [7:0] RAND_DATA_TWO     ;
    428                                                  	reg [7:0] RAND_DATA_THREE   ;
    429                                                  	reg [7:0] RAND_DATA_FOUR    ;
    430                                              
    431                                                  	/////////////////////// SDA Line //////////////////////
    432                                                  	//reg  	  RAND_SDA ;
    433                                              
    434                                                  	integer i ;
    435                                              
    436                                              	//----------------------------------- Functional Coverage -----------------------------------------//
    437                                              	//------------------------------------ FIRST GROUP ENEC_B -----------------------------------------//
    438                                              	// for every two rows in the excell sheet corresponds to a covergroup
    439                                              
    440                                              	covergroup ENEC_Broadcast @(posedge i_sys_clk_tb);
    441                                              		// coverpoint for operands 
    442                                              		o_tx_en : coverpoint o_tx_en_tb 
    443                                              		iff (i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1 )
    444                                              		{
    445                                              			bins tx_en_0 = {0};
    446                                              			bins tx_en_1 = {1};
    447                                              		}
    448                                              
    449                                              		o_tx_mode_TOC_0 : coverpoint o_tx_mode_tb iff (
    450                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1 && !i_regf_TOC_tb && i_engine_en_tb) 
    451                                              		{
    452                                              			bins tx_special_preamble 	  = {special_preamble};
    453                                              			bins tx_zero 				  = {zero};
    454                                              			bins tx_seven_zeros 		  = {seven_zeros};
    455                                              			bins tx_serializing_address   = {serializing_address};
    456                                              			bins tx_parity_calc 		  = {parity_calc};
    457                                              			bins tx_one 	 			  = {one};
    458                                              			bins tx_serializing_byte_port = {serializing_byte_port};
    459                                              			bins tx_c_token_CRC 		  = {c_token_CRC};
    460                                              			bins tx_value_CRC			  = {value_CRC};
    461                                              			bins tx_restart_pattern		  = {restart_pattern};
    462                                              			//illegal_bins tx_exit_pattern  = {exit_pattern};
    463                                              
    464                                              			// sequence bin to be added 
    465                                              		}
    466                                              
    467                                              		o_tx_mode_TOC_1 : coverpoint o_tx_mode_tb iff (
    468                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1 && i_regf_TOC_tb && i_engine_en_tb)
    469                                              		{
    470                                              			bins tx_special_preamble 	  = {special_preamble};
    471                                              			bins tx_zero 				  = {zero};
    472                                              			bins tx_seven_zeros 		  = {seven_zeros};
    473                                              			bins tx_serializing_address   = {serializing_address};
    474                                              			bins tx_parity_calc 		  = {parity_calc};
    475                                              			bins tx_one 	 			  = {one};
    476                                              			bins tx_serializing_byte_port = {serializing_byte_port};
    477                                              			bins tx_c_token_CRC 		  = {c_token_CRC};
    478                                              			bins tx_value_CRC			  = {value_CRC};
    479                                              			bins tx_exit_pattern		  = {exit_pattern};
    480                                              			//illegal_bins tx_restart_pattern  = {restart_pattern};
    481                                              
    482                                              			// sequence bin to be added 
    483                                              		}
    484                                              		o_sclstall_en : coverpoint o_sclstall_en_tb iff (
    485                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1) 
    486                                              		{
    487                                              			bins o_sclstall_en_0 = {0};
    488                                              			bins o_sclstall_en_1 = {1};
    489                                              		}
    490                                              
    491                                              		o_sclstall_code_TOC_0 : coverpoint i_stall_cycles iff (
    492                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1 && i_regf_TOC_tb == 0 && i_engine_en_tb)
    493                                              		{
    494                                              			bins o_stall_cycles_restart = {restart_pattern_stall};
    495                                              			//illegal_bins o_stall_cycles_exit = {exit_pattern_stall};
    496                                              		}
    497                                              
    498                                              		o_sclstall_code_TOC_1 : coverpoint i_stall_cycles iff (
    499                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1 && i_regf_TOC_tb == 1 && i_engine_en_tb)
    500                                              		{
    501                                              			//illegal_bins o_stall_cycles_restart = {restart_pattern_stall};
    502                                              			bins o_stall_cycles_exit = {exit_pattern_stall};
    503                                              		}
    504                                              
    505                                              
    506                                              		o_rx_en : coverpoint o_rx_en_tb iff (
    507                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1) 
    508                                              		{
    509                                              			bins o_rx_en_negedge_0 = {0};
    510                                              			bins o_rx_en_negedge_1 = {1};
    511                                              		}
    512                                              
    513                                              		o_rx_mode : coverpoint o_rx_mode_tb iff (
    514                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1) 
    515                                              		{
    516                                              			bins rx_preamble_rx_mode = {preamble_rx_mode};
    517                                              		}
    518                                              
    519                                              		i_rx_pre : coverpoint i_rx_pre_tb iff (
    520                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1) 
    521                                              		{
    522                                              			bins first_rx_pre = {0};
    523                                              			bins second_rx_pre = {1};
    524                                              		}
    525                                              
    526                                              		o_frmcnt_en : coverpoint o_frmcnt_en_tb iff (
    527                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1) 
    528                                              		{
    529                                              			bins o_frmcnt_en_0 = {0};
    530                                              			bins o_frmcnt_en_1 = {1};
    531                                              		}
    532                                              
    533                                              		o_sdahand_pp_od : coverpoint i_sdr_scl_gen_pp_od_tb iff (
    534                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1) 
    535                                              		{
    536                                              			//bins o_sdahand_pp_od_0 = {0};
    537                                              			bins o_sdahand_pp_od_1 = {1};
    538                                              		}
    539                                              
    540                                              		o_frmcnt_Direct_Broadcast_n : coverpoint o_frmcnt_Direct_Broadcast_n_tb iff (
    541                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1) 
    542                                              		{
    543                                              			bins o_frmcnt_Broadcast = {0};
    544                                              			illegal_bins o_frmcnt_Direct = {1};
    545                                              		}
    546                                              
    547                                              		o_regf_wr_en : coverpoint o_regf_wr_en_tb iff (
    548                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1) 
    549                                              		{
    550                                              			bins o_regf_wr_en_n = {0};
    551                                              			illegal_bins o_regf_wr_en = {1};
    552                                              		}
    553                                              
    554                                              		o_regf_rd_en : coverpoint o_regf_rd_en_tb iff (
    555                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1) 
    556                                              		{
    557                                              			bins o_regf_rd_en_0 = {0};
    558                                              			bins o_regf_rd_en_1 = {1};
    559                                              		}
    560                                              
    561                                              		o_regf_addr : coverpoint o_regf_addr_tb iff (
    562                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1 && i_engine_en_tb) 
    563                                              		{
    564                                              			bins o_regf_addr_first_location = {first_location + 4};
    565                                              			bins o_regf_addr_zeros = {first_location - 1};
    566                                              			ignore_bins last_addres_of_prev_cmd = {first_location + 5} ;
    567                                              			//illegal_bins other_addresses = default ;
    568                                              		}
    569                                              
    570                                              		o_txrx_addr_ccc : coverpoint o_txrx_addr_ccc_tb iff (
    571                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1)
    572                                              		{
    573                                              			bins CCC_value = {ENEC_B};
    574                                              			//ignore_bins others = default ;
    575                                              		}
    576                                              
    577                                              		o_engine_odd : coverpoint o_engine_odd_tb iff (
    578                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1) 
    579                                              		{
    580                                              			bins o_engine_odd_0 = {0};
    581                                              			bins o_engine_odd_1 = {1};
    582                                              		}
    583                                              
    584                                              		o_regf_ERR_STATUS : coverpoint o_regf_ERR_STATUS_tb iff (
    585                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1) 
    586                                              		{
    587                                              			bins o_regf_ERR_STATUS_tb = {SUCCESS};
    588                                              			bins others = default ;
    589                                              		}
    590                                              
    591                                              		o_engine_done : coverpoint o_engine_done_tb iff (
    592                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1) 
    593                                              		{
    594                                              			bins o_engine_done_0 = {0};
    595                                              			bins o_engine_done_1 = {1};
    596                                              		}
    597                                              
    598                                              	endgroup
    599                                              
    600                                              
    601             1                          1     		ENEC_Broadcast  ENEC_Broadcast_instance = new();
    602                                              		
    603                                              
    604                                              
    605                                              
    606                                              	//-------------------------------------------- SECOND GROUP DISEC_B---------------------------------------//
    607                                              
    608                                              	covergroup DISEC_Broadcast @(negedge i_sys_clk_tb);
    609                                              		// coverpoint for operands 
    610                                              		o_tx_en : coverpoint o_tx_en_tb iff (
    611                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h01 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1 ) 
    612                                              		{
    613                                              			bins tx_en_0 = {0};
    614                                              			bins tx_en_1 = {1};
    615                                              		}
    616                                              
    617                                              		o_tx_mode_TOC_0 : coverpoint o_tx_mode_tb iff (
    618                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h01 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1 && i_regf_TOC_tb == 0 && i_engine_en_tb ) 
    619                                              		{
    620                                              			bins tx_special_preamble 	  = {special_preamble};
    621                                              			bins tx_zero 				  = {zero};
    622                                              			bins tx_seven_zeros 		  = {seven_zeros};
    623                                              			bins tx_serializing_address   = {serializing_address};
    624                                              			bins tx_parity_calc 		  = {parity_calc};
    625                                              			bins tx_one 	 			  = {one};
    626                                              			bins tx_serializing_byte_port = {serializing_byte_port};
    627                                              			bins tx_c_token_CRC 		  = {c_token_CRC};
    628                                              			bins tx_value_CRC			  = {value_CRC};
    629                                              			bins tx_restart_pattern		  = {restart_pattern};
    630                                              			//illegal_bins tx_exit_pattern  = {exit_pattern};
    631                                              
    632                                              			// sequence bin to be added 
    633                                              		}
    634                                              
    635                                              		o_tx_mode_TOC_1 : coverpoint o_tx_mode_tb iff (
    636                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h01 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1 && i_regf_TOC_tb == 1 && i_engine_en_tb ) 
    637                                              		{
    638                                              			bins tx_special_preamble 	  = {special_preamble};
    639                                              			bins tx_zero 				  = {zero};
    640                                              			bins tx_seven_zeros 		  = {seven_zeros};
    641                                              			bins tx_serializing_address   = {serializing_address};
    642                                              			bins tx_parity_calc 		  = {parity_calc};
    643                                              			bins tx_one 	 			  = {one};
    644                                              			bins tx_serializing_byte_port = {serializing_byte_port};
    645                                              			bins tx_c_token_CRC 		  = {c_token_CRC};
    646                                              			bins tx_value_CRC			  = {value_CRC};
    647                                              			bins tx_exit_pattern		  = {exit_pattern};
    648                                              			//illegal_bins tx_restart_pattern  = {restart_pattern};
    649                                              
    650                                              		}
    651                                              		o_sclstall_en : coverpoint o_sclstall_en_tb iff (
    652                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h01 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1) 
    653                                              		{
    654                                              			bins o_sclstall_en_0 = {0};
    655                                              			bins o_sclstall_en_1 = {1};
    656                                              		}
    657                                              		o_sclstall_code_TOC_0 : coverpoint i_stall_cycles iff (
    658                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h01 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1 && i_regf_TOC_tb == 0 && i_engine_en_tb) 
    659                                              		{
    660                                              			bins o_stall_cycles_restart = {restart_pattern_stall};
    661                                              			//illegal_bins o_stall_cycles_exit = {exit_pattern_stall};
    662                                              		}
    663                                              
    664                                              		o_sclstall_code_TOC_1 : coverpoint i_stall_cycles iff (
