    2926            1                          1     	GETDCR_Direct  GETPID_Direct_instance = new();
    2927                                             
    2928                                             // 4-initial block 
    2929                                             /* IMPORTANT NOTES :
    2930                                             		1- (General) when driving input to the block which is considered as output of other block u must drive it at posedge not at negdge .
    2931                                             		2- (specifically for our system) : to predict the time to set the tx mode done u count like that >>
    2932                                             				(no. of SCL_DDR clk cycle - 1) + 1 sys clk  
    2933                                             */
    2934                                             
    2935                                             	initial begin 
    2936                                             		// time zero .. these are all signal to be driven in the test bench 
    2937            1                          1     		i_sclgen_rst_n_tb 	   = 1'b1 ;
    2938            1                          1     		i_scl_gen_stall_tb     = 1'b0 ;
    2939            1                          1     		i_sdr_ctrl_scl_idle_tb = 1'b0 ;
    2940            1                          1     		i_timer_cas_tb 	 	   = 1'b0 ;
    2941            1                          1     		i_engine_en_tb         = 1'b0 ;
    2942                                             		
    2943                                             		//i_rst_n_tb        = 1'b0 ; // asserted 
    2944            1                          1     		#(CLK_PERIOD) i_sclgen_rst_n_tb = 1'b0 ;
    2944            2                          1     
    2945            1                          1     		#(CLK_PERIOD) i_sclgen_rst_n_tb = 1'b1 ;
    2945            2                          1     
    2946            1                          1     		#(5*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    2947                                             
    2948            1                          1     		system_reset(); 
    2949            1                          1     		i_engine_configuration_tb = 12'd1000 ;
    2950                                             		
    2951            1                          1     		#(5*CLK_PERIOD);
    2952                                             		
    2953                                             
    2954                                             		// allocation of the object 
    2955            1                          1     		conf_obj = new();
    2956                                             
    2957            1                          1     		for (i=0 ; i<10000 ; i++) begin
    2957            2                      10000     
    2958                                             
    2959                                             			assert(conf_obj.randomize());  // "lw feh moshkla fel constrains edeny error" deh lazmet el word assert
    2960                                             			
    2961                                             
    2962            1                      10000     			RAND_CMD_ATTR  = conf_obj.RAND_CMD_ATTR  ;
    2963            1                      10000     			RAND_TID       = conf_obj.RAND_TID       ;
    2964            1                      10000     			RAND_CMD       = conf_obj.RAND_CMD       ;
    2965            1                      10000     			RAND_CP        = conf_obj.RAND_CP        ;
    2966            1                      10000     			RAND_DEV_INDEX = conf_obj.RAND_DEV_INDEX ;
    2967            1                      10000     			RAND_RESERVED  = conf_obj.RAND_RESERVED  ;
    2968            1                      10000     			RAND_DTT       = conf_obj.RAND_DTT       ;
    2969            1                      10000     			RAND_MODE      = conf_obj.RAND_MODE      ;
    2970            1                      10000     			RAND_RnW       = conf_obj.RAND_RnW       ;
    2971            1                      10000     			RAND_WROC      = conf_obj.RAND_WROC      ;
    2972            1                      10000     			RAND_TOC       = conf_obj.RAND_TOC       ;
    2973                                             
    2974            1                      10000     			RAND_DEF_BYTE   = conf_obj.RAND_DEF_BYTE  ;
    2975            1                      10000     			RAND_DATA_TWO   = conf_obj.RAND_DATA_TWO  ;
    2976            1                      10000     			RAND_DATA_THREE = conf_obj.RAND_DATA_THREE; 
    2977            1                      10000     			RAND_DATA_FOUR  = conf_obj.RAND_DATA_FOUR ; 
    2978                                             			
    2979            1                      10000     			i_engine_en_tb = 1'b0 ;
    2980            1                      10000     			switch_muxes (configuration_mux);
    2981            1                      10000     			input_configuration ();
    2982            1                      10000     			switch_muxes (Design_mux);
    2983            1                      10000     			i_engine_en_tb = 1'b1 ;
    2984                                             
    2985            1                      10000     			@(posedge o_engine_done_tb);
    2986            1                      10000     			$display("this is testcase no. %d",i,$time);
    2987            1                      10000     			#(2*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    2988                                             		end			
    2989            1                          1     		$stop ;
    2990                                             	end
    2991                                             
    2992                                             
    2993                                             
    2994                                             	// deserialization checking 
    2995                                             
    2996            1                     233406     	always @(CCC_Handler_dut.current_state) begin 
    2997                                             		if (i_engine_en_tb && CCC_Handler_dut.current_state == RNW) begin 
    2998            1                      16639     			#(CLK_PERIOD) ;
    2999            1                      16639     			check_cmd_word();
    3000                                             		end 
    3001                                             	end 
    3002                                             
    3003            1                     269962     	always @(CCC_Handler_dut.current_state) begin 
    3004                                             		if (i_engine_en_tb && CCC_Handler_dut.current_state == CCC_BYTE) begin 
    3005            1                      10000     			#(CLK_PERIOD) ;
    3006            1                      10000     			check_first_data_word();
    3007                                             		end 
    3008                                             	end
    3009                                             
    3010            1                     279550     	always @(CCC_Handler_dut.current_state) begin 
    3011                                             		if (!i_regf_RnW_tb && i_engine_en_tb && CCC_Handler_dut.current_state == FIRST_DATA_BYTE) begin 
    3012            1                       6804     			#(CLK_PERIOD) ;
    3013            1                       6804     			check_repeated_data_word();
    3014                                             		end 
    3015                                             	end
    3016                                             
    3017                                             
    3018                                             
    3019                                             /*
    3020                                             		// for second preamble and read data 
    3021                                             //////////////////////////////////////////////  Broadcast driver /////////////////////////////////
    3022                                             // backup works 100 % el7amdulelah 
    3023                                             // for second preamble and read data 
    3024                                             int cycle_count ;
    3025                                             		 // Simulation logic to create the desired pattern (Broadcast)
    3026                                                 initial begin	 		
    3027                                                 	for (i=0 ; i<100 ; i++) begin
    3028                                                 		#(2*CLK_PERIOD); // One clock cycle delay	
    3029                                                 		wait(i_engine_en_tb);
    3030                                                 		@(negedge scl_neg_edge_tb or  negedge scl_pos_edge_tb)
    3031                                                     		// Step 1: Randomize for 44 cycles
    3032                                                     		cycle_count = 37;
    3033                                                     		while (cycle_count > 0) begin
    3034                                                     		    i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = $random();
    3035                                                     		    #(CLK_PERIOD); // One clock cycle delay
    3036                                                     		    cycle_count--;
    3037                                                     		end
    3038                                                     		
    3039                                                     		// Step 2: Hold at zero for 4 cycles
    3040                                                     		i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = 0;
    3041                                                     		repeat (7) begin
    3042                                                     		#(CLK_PERIOD); // One clock cycle delay
    3043                                                     		end
    3044                                                     
    3045                                                     		// Step 3: Randomize for 38 cycles
    3046                                                     		cycle_count = 37;
    3047                                                     		while (cycle_count > 0) begin
    3048                                                     		    i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb =  $random();
    3049                                                     		   	#(CLK_PERIOD); // One clock cycle delay
    3050                                                    		 		cycle_count--;
    3051                                                     		end
    3052                                                     
    3053                                                     		// Step 4: Hold at one for 4 cycles
    3054                                                     		i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = 1;
    3055                                                     		repeat (4) begin
    3056                                                     		    #(CLK_PERIOD); // One clock cycle delay
    3057                                                     		end
    3058                                                     		
    3059                                                     		// Step 5: Randomize until engine_done is set to 1
    3060                                             				i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = $random();
    3061                                             				#(2*CLK_PERIOD); // One clock cycle delay
    3062                                             				wait (o_engine_done_tb) #(2*CLK_PERIOD);
    3063                                             				continue ;
    3064                                             				  
    3065                                                 	end 
    3066                                                 end
    3067                                             */
    3068                                             
    3069                                             
    3070                                             
    3071                                             /*
    3072                                             //////////////////////////////////////////////  Direct set driver /////////////////////////////////
    3073                                             
    3074                                             	initial begin 
    3075                                             		forever #(2*CLK_PERIOD) begin  
    3076                                             			@(negedge scl_neg_edge_tb or  negedge scl_pos_edge_tb) i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = 0 ;
    3077                                             		end
    3078                                             	end 
    3079                                             */
    3080                                             
    3081                                             
    3082                                             /*
    3083                                             //////////////////////////////////////////////  Direct Get driver /////////////////////////////////
    3084                                             // backup works 100 % el7amdulelah 
    3085                                             // for second preamble and read data 
    3086                                             int cycle_count ;
    3087                                             		 // Simulation logic to create the desired pattern (Broadcast)
    3088                                                 initial begin	 		
    3089                                                 	for (i=0 ; i<100 ; i++) begin
    3090                                                 		#(2*CLK_PERIOD); // One clock cycle delay	
    3091                                                 		wait(i_engine_en_tb);
    3092                                                 		@(negedge scl_neg_edge_tb or  negedge scl_pos_edge_tb)
    3093                                                     		// Step 1: Randomize for 44 cycles
    3094                                                     		cycle_count = 37;
    3095                                                     		while (cycle_count > 0) begin
    3096                                                     		    i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = $random();
    3097                                                     		    #(CLK_PERIOD); // One clock cycle delay
    3098                                                     		    cycle_count--;
    3099                                                     		end
    3100                                                     		
    3101                                                     		// Step 2: Hold at zero for 4 cycles
    3102                                                     		i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = 0;
    3103                                                     		repeat (12) begin
    3104                                                     		#(CLK_PERIOD); // One clock cycle delay
    3105                                                     		end
    3106                                                     		i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = 0;
    3107                                                     		//wait (i_sclstall_stall_done_tb) ;
    3108                                                     		@(negedge o_crc_en_tb) ;
    3109                                                     		#(3*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    3110                                             
    3111                                                     		//CRC Preamble 
    3112                                                     		i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = 1;
    3113                                                     		#(2*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    3114                                                     		i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = 0;
    3115                                                     		#(2*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    3116                                             
    3117                                                     		// C token 1100
    3118                                                     		i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = 1;
    3119                                                     		#(4*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    3120                                                     		i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = 0;
    3121                                                     		#(4*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    3122                                             
    3123                                             				wait (o_engine_done_tb) #(2*CLK_PERIOD);
    3124                                             				continue ;
    3125                                             				  
    3126                                                 	end 
    3127                                                 end
    3128                                             */
    3129                                             
    3130                                             /*
    3131                                             //////////////////////////////////////////////  General driver /////////////////////////////////
    3132                                             
    3133                                             	initial begin 
    3134                                             		forever #(2*CLK_PERIOD) begin  
    3135                                             			@(negedge scl_neg_edge_tb or negedge scl_pos_edge_tb) i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = $random() ;
    3136                                             		end
    3137                                             	end 
    3138                                             
    3139                                             
    3140                                             
    3141                                             ///////////////////////////////////////////////////// TASKS ///////////////////////////////////////
    3142                                             */
    3143                                             //////////////////////////////////////////////  General driver /////////////////////////////////
    3144                                             
    3145                                             	initial begin 
    3146            1                          1     		forever #(2*CLK_PERIOD) begin 
    3146            2                    1119871     
    3147                                             
    3148                                             			if (CCC_Handler_dut.current_state == PRE_FIRST_DATA_TWO) begin 
    3149            1                      16639     				@(negedge scl_neg_edge_tb or negedge scl_pos_edge_tb) ;
    3150            1                      16639     				i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = 1'b0 ;
    3151            1                      16639     				#(2*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    3152            1                      16639     				i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = 1'bz ;
    3153                                             			end
    3154                                             			else if (!RAND_RnW && CCC_Handler_dut.current_state == PRE_DATA_TWO) begin 
    3155            1                       4103     				@(negedge scl_neg_edge_tb or negedge scl_pos_edge_tb) ;
    3156            1                       4103     				i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = 1'b1 ;
    3157            1                       4103     				#(2*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    3158            1                       4103     				i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = 1'bz ;
    3159                                             			end
    3160                                             		end
    3161                                             	end 
    3162                                             
    3163                                             
    3164                                             	task system_reset ;
    3165                                             		begin 
    3166            1                          1     			@(negedge i_sys_clk_tb)
    3167            1                          1     			i_rst_n_tb = 1'b0 ;
    3168            1                          1     			#(CLK_PERIOD) i_rst_n_tb = 1'b1 ;
    3168            2                          1     
    3169                                             		end 
    3170                                             	endtask
    3171                                             
    3172                                             	task switch_muxes(input selector);
    3173                                             		begin 
    3174            1                      20000     			my_regf_wr_en_tb_selector    = selector ;
    3175            1                      20000     			my_regf_data_wr_tb_selector  = selector ;
    3176            1                      20000     			my_regf_addr_tb_selector     = selector ;
    3177                                             		end 
    3178                                             	endtask 
    3179                                             
    3180                                             	task input_configuration ();
    3181                                             		begin

    3202

    3233                                             	task check_cmd_word (); 
    3234                                             		begin 
    3235                                             			logic [17:0] collected_cmd_wrd ;
    3236                                             			bit 	     parity_adj_7e ,parity_adj ,P1_cmd_sel ,P1_cmd_ind ,P0_cmdword ;
    3237                                             			bit   [17:0] correct_first_cmd_word , correct_cmd_word ;
    3238                                             			int 		 o ;
    3239                                             
    3240            1                      16639     			for ( o = 0 ; o < 'd18 ; o++ ) begin 
    3240            2                     299502     
    3241                                             
    3242            1                     299502     			@ (posedge scl_pos_edge_tb or posedge scl_neg_edge_tb ) ;
    3243                                             
    3244            1                     299502     				collected_cmd_wrd['d17- o] = o_sdahnd_serial_data_tb ;
    3245                                             
    3246                                             				//$display("nvlaue of SDA line is  %b : %t",o_sdahnd_serial_data_tb,$time);
    3247                                             
    3248            1                     299502     				parity_adj    = collected_cmd_wrd[16] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[14] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[12] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[10] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[8] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[6] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[4]  ;
    3249                                             				//P1_cmdword    = i_regf_RnW_tb ^ collected_cmd_wrd[9] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[7] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[5] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[3] ; // index is shifted by 2 as this is the 18 bit word (data + parity)
    3250            1                     299502     				P1_cmd_sel    = i_regf_RnW_tb ^ collected_cmd_wrd[9] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[7] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[5] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[3] ; // index is shifted by 2 as this is the 18 bit word (data + parity)
    3251            1                     299502     				P1_cmd_ind 	  = 1'b0 		  ^ collected_cmd_wrd[9] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[7] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[5] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[3] ; // index is shifted by 2 as this is the 18 bit word (data + parity)
    3252            1                     299502     				P0_cmdword    =  1 ;
    3253            1                     299502     				correct_first_cmd_word = {1'b0 		    , 7'd0 , 7'h7E 					 , parity_adj , P1_cmd_ind , P0_cmdword } ;
    3254            1                     299502     				correct_cmd_word 	   = {i_regf_RnW_tb , 7'd0 , o_txrx_addr_ccc_tb[6:0] , parity_adj , P1_cmd_sel , P0_cmdword } ;
    3255                                             
    3256            1                     299502     				# (2*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    3257                                             				if (o == 'd17) begin 
    3258                                             					if (CCC_Handler_dut.first_time || !CCC_Handler_dut.Direct_Broadcast_n_del) begin  // this is a 7E cmd word
    3259                                             						assert (correct_first_cmd_word == collected_cmd_wrd) $display("first command word is PERFECTOO: %t" ,$time);
    3260                                             						else $display("first command word is WRONG: %t" ,$time);
    3261                                             					end 
    3262                                             					else begin 	// this is an address word  
    3263                                             						assert (correct_cmd_word == collected_cmd_wrd) $display("first command word is PERFECTOO: %t" ,$time);
    3264                                             						else $display("first command word is WRONG: %t" ,$time);
    3265                                             					end 
    3266                                             				end  
    3267                                             			end 
    3268                                             		end  
    3269                                             	endtask 
    3270                                             
    3271                                             
    3272                                             	task check_first_data_word (); 
    3273                                             		begin 
    3274                                             			logic [17:0] collected_data_wrd ;
    3275                                             			bit 	     P1 ,P0 ;
    3276                                             			bit   [17:0] correct_first_data_word  ;
    3277                                             			int 		 o ;
    3278                                             
    3279            1                      10000     			for ( o = 0 ; o < 'd18 ; o++ ) begin 
    3279            2                     180000     
    3280                                             
    3281            1                     180000     			@ (posedge scl_pos_edge_tb or posedge scl_neg_edge_tb ) ;
    3282                                             
    3283            1                     180000     				collected_data_wrd['d17- o] = o_sdahnd_serial_data_tb ;
    3284                                             
    3285                                             				//$display("vlaue of SDA line is  %b : %t",o_sdahnd_serial_data_tb,$time);
    3286                                             
    3287            1                     180000     				P1 = collected_data_wrd[17] ^ collected_data_wrd[15] ^ collected_data_wrd[13] ^ collected_data_wrd[11] ^ collected_data_wrd[9] ^
    3288                                             				 	 collected_data_wrd[7] ^ collected_data_wrd[5] ^ collected_data_wrd[3] ;
    3289                                             
    3290            1                     180000     				P0 = collected_data_wrd[16] ^ collected_data_wrd[14] ^ collected_data_wrd[12] ^ collected_data_wrd[10] ^ collected_data_wrd[8] ^
    3291                                             					 collected_data_wrd[6] ^ collected_data_wrd[4] ^ collected_data_wrd[2] ^ 1 ; 
    3292                                             
    3293            1                     180000     				correct_first_data_word = { o_txrx_addr_ccc_tb , 8'd0 ,  P1 , P0 } ;
    3294                                             
    3295            1                     180000     				# (2*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    3296                                             				if (o == 'd17) begin 
    3297                                             					assert (correct_first_data_word == collected_data_wrd) $display("first data word is PERFECTOO: %t" ,$time);
    3298                                             					else $display("first data word is WRONG: %t" ,$time);
    3299                                             				end  
    3300                                             			end 
    3301                                             		end  
    3302                                             	endtask 
    3303                                             
    3304                                             
    3305                                             
    3306                                             	task check_repeated_data_word (); 
    3307                                             		begin 
    3308                                             			logic [17:0] collected_data_wrd ;
    3309                                             			bit 	     P1 ,P0 ;
    3310                                             			bit   [17:0] correct_repeated_data_word  ;
    3311                                             			int 		 o ;
    3312                                             			bit   [7:0] tmp_D1 , tmp_D0 ;
    3313                                             
    3314            1                       6804     			for ( o = 0 ; o < 'd18 ; o++ ) begin 
    3314            2                     122472     
    3315                                             
    3316            1                     122472     			@ (posedge scl_pos_edge_tb or posedge scl_neg_edge_tb ) ;
    3317                                             
    3318            1                     122472     				collected_data_wrd['d17- o] = o_sdahnd_serial_data_tb ;
    3319                                             
    3320                                             				//$display("vlaue of SDA line is  %b : %t",o_sdahnd_serial_data_tb,$time);
    3321                                             
    3322            1                     122472     				P1 = correct_repeated_data_word[17] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[15] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[13] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[11] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[9] ^
    3323                                             				 	 correct_repeated_data_word[7] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[5] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[3] ;
    3324                                             
    3325            1                     122472     				P0 = correct_repeated_data_word[16] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[14] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[12] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[10] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[8] ^
    3326                                             					 correct_repeated_data_word[6] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[4] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[2] ^ 1 ; 
    3327                                             
    3328                                             				if (o == 'd3) begin                            // any arbitrary value btn 0 -> 7
    3329            1                       6804     					tmp_D1 = i_regf_tx_parallel_data_tb ; 
    3330                                             				end
    3331                                             	
    3332                                             				if (o == 'd10) begin 	 	 	 	 	 	   // any arbitrary value btn 8 -> 15
    3333            1                       6804     					tmp_D0 = i_regf_tx_parallel_data_tb ;
    3334                                             				end 
    3335                                             
    3336            1                     122472     				correct_repeated_data_word = { tmp_D1 , tmp_D0 , P1 , P0 };
    3337                                             
    3338            1                     122472     				# (2*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    3339                                             				if (o == 'd17) begin 
    3340            1                       6804     					correct_repeated_data_word = { tmp_D1 , tmp_D0 , P1 , P0 };
    3341                                             					assert (correct_repeated_data_word == collected_data_wrd) $display("repeated data word is PERFECTOO: %t" ,$time);
    3342                                             					else $display("repeated data word is WRONG: %t" ,$time);
    3343                                             				end  
    3344                                             			end 
    3345                                             		end  
    3346                                             	endtask 
    3347                                             
    3348                                             
    3349                                             
    3350                                             
    3351                                             
    3352                                             	reg [28:0] read_vector_2_1 = 29'b0000_0000_0000_0000_01_01_1100_00001 ;
    3353                                             	reg [28:0] read_vector_2_2 = 29'b1111_1111_1111_1111_01_01_1100_01010 ;
    3354                                             	reg [28:0] read_vector_2_3 = 29'b1010_1010_1010_1010_01_01_1100_10000 ;
    3355                                             	reg [28:0] read_vector_2_4 = 29'b1111_0000_1111_0000_01_01_1100_11001 ;
    3356                                             	reg [49:0] read_vector_4_1 = 50'b0000_0000_1000_0001_10_1zz_0011_1111_1111_1111_10_01_1100_10100 ;
    3357                                             	reg [70:0] read_vector_6_1 = 71'b1010_1010_1010_1010_01_1zz_1111_1111_1111_1110_00_1zz_0000_0010_1111_0000_11_01_1100_01100 ;
    3358                                             	reg [70:0] read_vector_6_2 = 71'b0000_1111_0000_1000_11_1zz_1111_1111_0000_0000_01_1zz_0011_1100_0000_1111_01_01_1100_10001 ;
    3359                                             
    3360            1                     290831     	always @(CCC_Handler_dut.next_state) begin 
    3361                                             		if ( (RAND_RnW == 1 ) && (RAND_CMD_ATTR == 'd0) && ({RAND_DATA_FOUR,RAND_DATA_THREE} == 'd2 || {RAND_DATA_FOUR,RAND_DATA_THREE} == 'd1 ) && (i_engine_en_tb && CCC_Handler_dut.next_state == FIRST_DATA_BYTE)) begin 
    3362            1                       1522     			Drive_repeated_data_word_2();
    3363                                             		end 
    3364                                             	end
    3365                                             
    3366                                             
    3367            1                     282154     	always @(CCC_Handler_dut.next_state) begin 
    3368                                             		if ( (RAND_RnW == 1 ) && (RAND_CMD_ATTR == 'd0) && ({RAND_DATA_FOUR,RAND_DATA_THREE} == 'd3 || {RAND_DATA_FOUR,RAND_DATA_THREE} == 'd4 ) && (i_engine_en_tb && CCC_Handler_dut.next_state == FIRST_DATA_BYTE) ) begin 
    3369            1                       1619     			Drive_repeated_data_word_4();
    3370                                             		end 
    3371                                             	end
    3372                                             /*
    3373                                             	always @(DUT.CCC_Handler.next_state or DUT.DDR_NT.next_state) begin 
    3374                                             		if ( (DUT.cccnt_RnW == 1 ) && (RAND_CMD_ATTR == 'd0) && ({RAND_DATA_FOUR,RAND_DATA_THREE} == 'd6 ) && ((DUT.CCC_Handler.i_engine_en && DUT.CCC_Handler.next_state == FIRST_DATA_BYTE) || (DUT.DDR_NT.i_engine_en && DUT.DDR_NT.next_state == first_data_byte))) begin 
    3375                                             			Drive_repeated_data_word_6();
    3376                                             		end 
    3377                                             	end
    3378                                             */
    3379                                             
    3380                                             	task Drive_repeated_data_word_2 (); // check read commands
    3381                                             		begin 
    3382                                             			int 		 o ; // counter
    3383            1                       1522     			#(CLK_PERIOD);
    3384            1                       1522     			for ( o = 0 ; o < 'd29 ; o++ ) begin 
    3384            2                      44138     
    3385                                             
    3386            1                      44138     				@ (negedge scl_neg_edge_tb or negedge scl_pos_edge_tb ) ;
    3387            1                      44138     				i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = read_vector_2_2[28 - o];
    3388            1                      44138     				# (2*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    3389                                              
    3390                                             			end
    3391            1                       1522     			i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = 1'bz ;
    3392            1                       1522     			# (2*CLK_PERIOD) ;
